txt.en: 'Heavy was the darkness of that winter's day at Azanulbizar for the skies were filled with great-bats out of Moria.'
Many were the bats slain during the Battle of Azanulbizar.
'Had the creatures forgotten their gift? Such things could not stand toe-to-toe with a dwarf!
Learn of the bats slain at Azanulbizar
Many were the bats slain during the Battle of Azanulbizar.
